Schedule Schema

SIMBA Scheduler

The schema describes which and how modules are executed during each tick of the driver.

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NSSAC/SIMBA_driver/schema/schedule.json

type

array

items

Module Schedule

A specification of a module and its schedule.

type

object

properties

  • name

Module Name

The name of the module.

type

string

  • class

Module Python Class

The python class name of the module.

type

string

  • package

Module Python Package

The python package name of the module.

type

string

  • priority

Priority of Module Execution

Higher priority is executed first. Priorities must be unique.

anyOf

type

number

enum

-Infinity, Infinity

  • startTick

Module Start Tick

The tick the module is executed the first time.

type

integer

default

0

  • tickIncrement

Module Tick Increment

The increment determining the next tick at which the module is executed. If the increment is 0 the module is only executed once.

type

number

minimum

0

default

0

  • endTick

Module End Tick

The last Tick at which the Module may be executed.

default

startTick if tickIncrement is 0, Infinity otherwise.

anyOf

type

integer

enum

Infinity

  • moduleData

Module specific Data

Module specific data provided to the module upon execution.

type

object
